derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin monitio(n-), from monere 'warn'

means.word_mean: 2. cautionary advice about something imminent (especially imminent danger)
3. a summons issued after the filing of a libel or claim directing all parties concerned to show cause why the judgment asked for should not be granted
